methods.name: WithSizes
methods.summary: Sets the output icon sizes in pixels.

methods.name: WithPreserveAspectRatio
methods.summary: Sets whether to preserve aspect ratio when rendering icons.

properties.name: Sizes
properties.summary: Output sizes in pixels (1..256). Defaults to common icon sizes.

properties.name: PreserveAspectRatio
properties.summary: Preserves aspect ratio and pads to square when true.
